programme.desc: L'heure des derniers réglages. A quelques jours du grand début de l'Euro de basket féminin, les Bleues veulent finir en beauté cette période de préparation. Face à une solide formation de Chine, les françaises pourront se reposer sur leur attaque de feu emmenée par la virtuose du basket français, Marine Johannès, pour s'imposer et faire le plein de confiance.(n)

programme.title: Athlétisme - Meeting de Nancy
programme.desc: Un plateau de choix. programme.title: Basket-ball - Orléans / Rouen
programme.desc: Un match à ne pas perdre. Au coude à coude dans cette finale de Pro B, Orléans et Rouen vont se disputer le dernier ticket pour la Jeep Elite. En pleine confiance après leur net succès, lors du match 2, les Normands pourront se reposer sur leur trio de feu, Begarin-Maille-Coleman, pour rejoindre Roanne dans l'élite du basket français.(n)

programme.title: Basket-ball - Villeurbanne / Monaco
programme.desc: L'épilogue d'une finale exceptionnelle. Intraitables à domicile dans cette grande finale de Jeep Elite, l'ASVEL et Monaco s'affrontent une dernière fois, dans une Astroballe bouillante, pour décrocher le titre suprême de champion de France. Face à une Roca Team en feu portée par le virtuose, Dee Bost, les Villeurbannais pourront se reposer sur leur défense de fer pour succéder au Mans en remportant son 19ème titre de champion devant son président, Tony Parker, la légende du basket français.(n)

programme.title: Sport - New England Patriots / Los Angeles Rams
programme.desc: Pour la première fois, TF1 propose l'un des évènements les plus importants du Sport US, la finale de NFL, le SUPER BOWL LIII , le dimanche 3 février à Minuit, en direct d'Atlanta ! Le SUPER BOWL est l'un des évènements les plus regardés au monde avec la Coupe du Monde de Football ou encore les Jeux Olympiques. Quelle équipe succèdera aux EAGLES de Philadelphie ? Avec les finales de conférences AFC et NFC qui auront lieu le 20 janvier prochain, quatre équipes peuvent encore prétendre au titre suprême tant convoité de l'autre côté de l'Atlantique, à savoir : Kansas City Chiefs New England Patriots New Orleans Saints Los Angeles Rams Le Super Bowl, c'est également un show attendu à la mi-temps de la rencontre. Cette année, le groupe Maroon 5 accompagné des rappeurs Travis Scott et Big Boi. Ce show unique sera diffusé à 02h20 du matin en exclusivité en clair sur TF1.(n)

programme.desc: In 1983, Jim Valvano led the NC State Wolfpack through nine consecutive do-or-die matches. But one game and one play will be remembered forever. Part of the 30 for 30 series.(n)

programme.title: Elway to Marino

programme.title: Prem Rugby: Tries of the Season
programme.desc: The pick of the tries from the 2018/19 Gallagher Premiership season. Plus, interviews with Exeter Chiefs duo Henry Slade and Santiago Cordero and Gloucester's Danny Cipriani.(n)

programme.title: Men's Hockey: GBR v Netherlands
programme.desc: Great Britain face Netherlands in the 3rd place match from the Men's FIH Hockey Pro League at the Wagener Stadium in Amsterdam.(n)

programme.title: Men's Hockey: Belgium v Australia
programme.desc: Belgium meet Australia in the final of the Men's FIH Hockey Pro League in Amsterdam's Wagener Stadium.(n)

programme.title: World Taekwondo Championships 2019
programme.desc: The best of the action from the 2019 World Taekwondo Championships in Manchester, as Britain's Jade Jones won her first world title to go alongside her two Olympic gold medals.(n)

programme.title: BRDC Formula 3 Championship
programme.desc: The best of the action from the fourth round of the BRDC Formula 3 Championship from Donington Park.(n)

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Stories of the Finals
programme.desc: We take a look back at Manchester United's historic UEFA Champions League final win over Bayern Munich in 1999 and Liverpool's epic victory over AC Milan in 2005.(n)

programme.title: Liverpool: Team of the Seventies
programme.desc: A look back at some of the best players, goals and matches from Liverpool's golden era, as the Shankly and Paisley glory years are revisited. 1/2.(n)

programme.title: Manchester United Classics
programme.desc: Classic Manchester United matches from the football archives, featuring memorable league clashes against Crystal Palace (1971), Coventry (1972) and Southampton (1991). 9/10.(n)

programme.title: Benji
programme.desc: In 1984, 17-year-old Ben Wilson was America's most talented basketball prospect until the sweet-natured boy was senselessly murdered. Part of the award-winning 30 for 30 series.(n)

programme.title: Bristol Bears v Bath Rugby
programme.desc: Relive the thrilling curtain-raiser of the 2018/19 Gallagher Premiership season as local rivals Bristol Bears and Bath Rugby went head-to-head at Ashton Gate.(n)

programme.title: Wasps v Exeter Chiefs
programme.desc: Look back as Wasps faced Exeter Chiefs in the Gallagher Premiership at the Ricoh Arena. Henry Slade impressed for the visitors as Exeter picked up back-to-back bonus-point wins.(n)

programme.title: Bath Rugby v Gloucester Rugby
programme.desc: Revisit Bath and Gloucester's clash at The Rec from the 2018/19 Gallagher Premiership season. Gloucester had won just one of their last four trips to their West Country rivals.(n)

programme.title: World Sailing
programme.desc: The latest action and news from the world of sailing.(n)

programme.title: Inside Sailing
programme.desc: This episode visits Italy for the GC32 Racing Tour and the Pascucci Formula Kite World Championship. The show ends with a trip to California's Long Beach for the Congressional Cup.(n)

programme.title: Live SGB: Belle Vue v Poole
programme.desc: Poole Pirates travel to face Belle Vue in the SGB Premiership at the National Speedway Stadium. Poole came out 37-35 victors when these two met last week in the reverse fixture.(n)

programme.title: Premier League Tonight: Best Of
programme.desc: A look back at all the best moments from Premier League Tonight during the 2018/19 season.(n)

programme.title: ESPN Films: Catching Hell
programme.desc: This film uses the case of Steve Bartman - the fan who interfered with an in-play ball in the 2003 NLCS and was vilified for it - to examine scapegoating in the sports world.(n)

programme.title: White, Blue and White
programme.desc: Ossie Ardiles left home to play in England. In 1982, Argentina invaded the Falkland Islands and he returned home with his future in doubt. Part of the ESPN Soccer Stories series.(n)

programme.title: BT Sport Reload
programme.desc: The best bits from BT Sport over the last week, including exclusive interviews, the best action and so much more.(n)

programme.title: SailGP Highlights: New York
programme.desc: Highlights from days one and two of SailGP in New York, round three of the season.(n)

programme.title: AFL: Fremantle v Carlton
programme.desc: Fremantle face Carlton in round 15 of the Australian Football League at Optus Stadium. The Dockers have won six of the last seven meetings between the two sides.(n)

programme.title: Moto3: Grand Prix of Assen
programme.desc: Coverage of the Moto3 race from the Grand Prix of Assen, round eight of the 2019 MotoGP season. Spanish rider Aron Canet looks to extend his 23-point championship lead here.(n)

programme.title: Moto2: Grand Prix of Assen
programme.desc: Coverage of the Moto2 race from the Grand Prix of Assen, round eight of the season. Alex Marquez has won each of the last three rounds and currently heads the championship.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP: Grand Prix of Assen
programme.desc: Coverage of the MotoGP race from the Grand Prix of Assen, round eight of the 2019 MotoGP season. Valentino Rossi is looking to make it nine career wins at this track in this class.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders. Plus, a look behind the scenes with the team bosses and mechanics.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP Films: Racing Together
programme.desc: This fascinating documentary chronicles the history of MotoGP. Packed with facts and information, even the most knowledgeable racing fan will learn something new.(n)

programme.title: What I Wore: Gary Lineker
programme.desc: Former Tottenham and England striker Gary Lineker describes his passion for football via the shirts which have defined his life.(n)

programme.title: The Football Archives: 1970/71
programme.desc: BT Sport offers a nostalgic look back at the top goals from 1970/71 accompanied by a memorable soundtrack from that period. Arsenal became just the fourth club to win the double.(n)

programme.title: The Football Archives: 1972/73
programme.desc: BT Sport offers a nostalgic look back at the top goals from 1972/73 accompanied by a memorable soundtrack from that period. Liverpool clinched their first title in seven years.(n)

Phim truyện: Dù ghét vẫn yêu - Tập 46

Phim truyện: Mộng phù hoa - Tập 32

Nhân đạo: Khám chữa bệnh nhân đạo
